lessons

Class Lesson

  • java.lang.Object
    • lessons.Lesson

  • public class Lesson
extends java.lang.Object
    This entity class holds information regarding an instance of Lesson in an instance of Course

    2018/11/09
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
